GK19govass_u:1494: saṃvṛṇu bāṣpa-jalaṃ sakhi dṛśam uparajyāñjanena valayainām |
GK19govass_u:1495: dayitaḥ paśyatu pallava-paṅkajayor yugapad eva rucam ||GAss_683||
GK19govass_u:1496: sā pāṇḍu-durbalāṅgī nayasi tvaṃ yatra yāti tatraiva |
GK19govass_u:1498: sakhi viśva-gañjanīyā lakṣmīr iva kamala-mukhi kadaryasya |
GK19govass_u:1502: hṛdayajñayā gavākṣe visadṛkṣaṃ kim api kūjitaṃ sakhyā |
GK19govass_u:1503: yat kalaha-bhinna-talpā bhaya-kapaṭād eti māṃ sutanu ||GAss_686||
GK19govass_u:1504: harati hṛdayaṃ śalākā-nihito 'ñjana-tantur eṣa sakhi mugdhe |
GK19govass_u:1506: hasasi caraṇa-prahāre talpād apasārito bhuvi svapiṣi |
GK19govass_u:1507: nāsadṛśe'pi kṛte priya mama hṛdayāt tvaṃ viniḥsarasi ||GAss_688||
GK19govass_u:1508: hasati sapatnī śvaśrū roditi vadanaṃ ca pidadhate sakhyaḥ |
GK19govass_u:1513: aruṇas tapana-śilām iva punar na māṃ bhasmatāṃ nayati ||GAss_691||
GK19govass_u:1514: hṛtvā taṭini taraṅgair bhramitaś cakreṣu nāśaye nihitaḥ |
GK19govass_u:1520: kṣīrasya tu dayitatvaṃ yato 'pi śāntopacāram āsādya |
GK19govass_u:1522: kṣāntam apasārito yac caraṇāv upadhāya supta evāsi |
GK19govass_u:1523: udghāṭayasi kim ūru niḥśvāsaiḥ pulakayann uṣṇaiḥ ||GAss_695||
GK19govass_u:1524: kṣudrodbhavasya kaṭutāṃ prakaṭayato yac chataś ca madam uccaiḥ |
GK19govass_u:1525: madhuno laghu-puruṣasya ca garimā laghimā ca bhedāya ||GAss_696||
GK19govass_u:1527: vāg-devīṃ bhajato mama santaḥ paśyantu ko doṣaḥ ||GAss_697||
GK19govass_u:1529: kasya na janayati harṣaṃ sat-kāvyaṃ madhura-vacanaṃ ca ||GAss_698||
